casebody.data:
First Department,

January, 1961

(January 3, 1961) Reinaldo Bustamante, Jr., by His Guardian ad Litem, Evelyn Bustamante, et al. v. New York Telephone Company et al.

Motion for leave to appeal as poor persons granted to the extent and on the terms and conditions contained in the order of this court. Concur — Botein, P. J., Breitel, Rabin, Valente and McNally, JJ.
